creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hat with large water buffalo ears and horns; ring of relief flowers around base of hat; cones and pedestaled flowers on main body of hat; ears with bird motifs; horns have three panels: bird, flower and leaf;  face on front of hat body with flowers on each cheek; chin chain
dimension: 25 1/2 x 13 1/2 x 7 1/2 in. (64.77 x 34.29 x 19.05 cm) (with chain dangling)
title: Hat
